Title: Relates to racing support payments
Summary: Provides that by the last day of the first month following the end of each fiscal quarter, the relevant horsemen and breeders organizations shall provide the licensee with a calculation of the support payment owed by the licensee; makes related provisions.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to racing support payments
